sen.j: 片岡 仁左衛門（かたおか にざえもん）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Nizaemon KATAOKA is one of myoseki (professional names) of kabuki actor.
Nizaemon KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Nizaemon KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Its yago (stage family name) is Matsushimaya.
The stage family name is Matsushimaya.
The stage family name is Matsushimaya.

sen.j: 定紋は七つ割丸に二引、替紋は追いかけ五枚銀杏。
sen.e: Its jomon (family crest) is Nanatsuwarimaru ni nihiki and its kaemon (alternate family crest) is Oikake Gomai Icho.

The Jomon (family crest) is Nanatsu-wari Maru ni Ni-hiki (literally, seven percents with two lines and a circle) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Oikake Gomai Icho (literally, chase of five Ginko leaves).
sen.cmt: ウェブに合わせて、原文に「は七つ割丸に二引、」「追いかけ五枚銀杏。」を補足し、表現を合わせました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Nanatsu-wari Maru ni Ni-hiki (two horizontal lines inside a circle that each have a width equal to one-seventh the diameter of the circle), and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Oikake Gomai Icho (five Ginko leaves arranged in a circle as if they were chasing each other).
sen.cmt: 「七つ割丸に二引」(http://gogonetshop.com/scb/shop/shop.cgi?No=338)「円の中に円の縦幅の1/7の太さの横線を２つ引いたもの」のように訳しました。「追いかけ五枚銀杏」は絵を見る銀杏の絵がぐるりと追いかけているように丸く並んでいる様子を表しました。

sen.j: 10代目以降は「我童家」と「我當家」が交互に名跡を継ぐのが慣わしとなっている。
sen.e: Since the tenth, this myoseki has been customarily succeeded by "the Gado family" and "the Gato family" alternately.
Since the tenth, this professional name has been customarily succeeded by 'the Gado family' and 'the Gato family' alternately.
Since the tenth, this professional name has been customarily succeeded by 'the Gado family' and 'the Gato family' alternately.
